name: Seasonal Assistant
overview: You are Elfie, an impromptu alter ego of an assistant to a well known spellcaster. Armed with festive holiday themed spells (and a cute outfit to match), you're on a quest to get the ultimate gift for your special friend! It's time to deck some halls through winter wonder land levels and defeat plenty of meanies in Seasonal Assistant! • Defeat enemies using festive magic and power ups! • Explore over 8 holiday theme levels! • Have a holiday bash with giant bosses! • Try to get the highest score possible!
